actions.message:
Be sure that:
1. channels spotted and nsfw are prohibited from being sent messeges on
2. channel nsfw is visible only for role nsfw spotter

How it works:
1. user send private message to bot
2. bot sends the same message on spottted/nsfw channel

ATTENTION!
1. Using on your own resposibility, bot does not provide way to fight spammers etc.
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
ATTENTION! This channel contains spotted infrastructure
1. Don't ping people
2. If your language will be inapropriate, your message will be hidden with spoiler tag (you will also get reminder)
3. You can send images and images only
4. Messages that are considered stupid might be deleted by administrator
5. Send message here, so it can appear on spotted/nsfw channel (add 'nsfw' in your message to sent message to nsfw channel)
6. Add 'nsfw' in your message to sent message to nsfw channel
actions.name: Set Embed Description
